Uses of Class
component.Component

  • Packages that use Component 
    Package Description
    assets  
    component  
    model  
    state  
    view  

    • Uses of Component in assets

      Subclasses of Component in assets 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Assets.GameBackground
      A class for the game background (currently a grid to assist debugging)
      private static class  Assets.LightAnimation
      A class for the light on top of the tower in the menu screen
      private static class  Assets.LoadingBackground
      A class for the background on the loading screen.
      private static class  Assets.LoadingText
      A class for the "Loading..." text in the loading screen.
      private static class  Assets.MenuBackground
      A class for the background of the menu screen
      private static class  Assets.SettingsButton
      A class for the settings button on the menu screen
      private static class  Assets.StartGameButton
      A class for the start game button

    • Uses of Component in component

      Subclasses of Component in component 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClickableComponent
      A class representing a component which can be clicked on or moused over
      class  Item
      A class representing a collectible item which can be stored in the inventory.
      static class  Item.MudItem
      An Item for Tile.DirtTile
      static class  Item.ScaffoldItem
      An Item for Tile.ScaffoldTile
      static class  Item.StoneItem
      An Item for Tile.StoneTile
      class  Tile
      A class representing a Tile drawn on the screen.
      static class  Tile.Crystal
      A class for the Crystal at the top of the tower
      static class  Tile.DirtTile
      A class for dirt.
      static class  Tile.GrassTile
      A class for grass.
      static class  Tile.LogTile
      A class for logs.
      static class  Tile.ScaffoldTile
      As of now, the only Tile that can collapse under the weight of other tiles
      static class  Tile.StoneTile
      A class for stone.

    • Uses of Component in model

      Subclasses of Component in model 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TileManager
      A class which manages the behavior of Tiles in the game Tile Assets are loaded in this class instead of in Assets for better organization Tile behavior is handled in this class instead of in the GameState class because the TileManager contains data about every Tile
      Fields in model declared as Component 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Component Game.loadingBackground
      These Components are kept loaded in the Game for display when the game is changing States
      private Component Game.loadingText 

    • Uses of Component in state

      Subclasses of Component in state 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  GameState.BreakIndicator
      Informs the user of the status of the current tile to be broken Displays a little wheel at the mouse cursor that fills.
      private class  GameState.Hotbar
      A class for the hotbar which stores Items that the user can place.
      private class  GameState.Hotbar.Selection
      Indicates which slot of the Hotbar is selected
      private class  GameState.InventorySlot
      A class for holding one or many Items in the Hotbar
      private class  GameState.PlaceIndicator
      Shows an Item texture at the cursor's position which indicates the item that will be placed
      private class  GameState.WarFog
      Indicates which parts of the screen cannot be edited due to the tower
      Fields in state declared as Component 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Component MenuState.background
      The background
      private Component GameState.background
      The background for the GameState
      private Component MenuState.lightAnimation
      A little animation for the light on top of the tower

    • Uses of Component in view

      Fields in view declared as Component 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Component LayerManager.Node.c
      The Component
      Methods in view with parameters of type Component 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void LayerManager.addComponent(Component c, int layer)
      Adds a Component to the LinkedList in order of the layer in the Component
      void LayerManager.remove(Component c)
      Removes the given Component from the LayerManager
      void LayerManager.temporaryAdd(Component c, int layer)
      Adds a Component which will later be removed
      Constructors in view with parameters of type Component 
      Constructor and Description
      Node(Component c)
      Constructs a new Node with the given Component
